column4: Yeah it sucks as I need it for BBC radio but nothing I can do. But it's affecting my browsers so I need to unistall it but I can't >_<.
do you still have the .bin file
does that mean it works for AMD64? As the forums say it doesn't
there should be a switch for that .bin to uninstall
how would I do it if the realplayer bin is in my home dir?
first I'd open synaptic and search for "realplayer"
it it does, select it for uninstallation
what would my home dir be?
because by ubuntu default su is off
